# Create a N by 2 Matrix from 3 arrays

Names of each array become row names automatically. 

```{r}

ar_row_one <- c(-1,+1) 
ar_row_two <- c(-3,-2)
ar_row_three <- c(0.35,0.75)

mt_n_by_2 <- rbind(ar_row_one, ar_row_two, ar_row_three)
print(mt_n_by_2)
```
